attributes.action: Paying for Vehicle Tax by monthly or 6-monthly Direct Debit should NOT cost more
attributes.background:
The option to pay for Vehicle Tax by Direct Debit was brought in to make it easier to pay. So why, does it cost you more to pay monthly or 6 monthly? 

Penalising those who want to pay but spread the money out to lessen the blow on their hard earnt wages IS NOT FAIR.
